name: Byesee Bye Balloon
description:
Sacrifice items to further Byesee’s journey! Byesee Bye Balloon is a hot air balloon merchant traveling the world with the goal to become the best hot air balloon merchant in the history of hot air balloon merchants! Guide him through his adventures while managing the goods carefully and don’t let him fall into that dark and scary forest down below.

  • Drop items to gain altitude.
  • Each item has weight and value (didn't manage to implement GUI for that, but it's there).
  • Heavier stuff gives you a bigger boost.
  • Value of items you have in your belly basket by the finish line is your score.

We unfortunately didn't have time to implement all what we wanted.

We're missing obstacles, price tags and weights, collectible items and more levels, to name a few.

Credits:

Programming - Jānis Mancēvičs (Roll); Environment Design - Matejs Balodis (Dimples); Character Design - Kristaps Balodis (Little Thunder); Music & Sound Design - Agnis Aldiņš (Nezvērs).

Tools:

Godot; Inkscape; Krita; Reaper.
